## Before the workshop

Please make sure you have the following installed:

1.  An [up-to-date installation of R](https://www.r-project.org/)
2.  [RStudio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)
3.  :package:\[malariasimulation\] installed. See [here](https://github.com/mrc-ide/malariasimulation#installation) for more info. You should be able to successfully run: `output <- malariasimulation::run_simulation(100)`
4.  The malariaverse :package:\[foresite\], :package:\[site\], :package:\[netz\], :package:\[cali\]

<!-- -->

    remotes::install_github("mrc-ide/foresite")
    remotes::install_github("mrc-ide/site")
    remotes::install_github("mrc-ide/netz")
    remotes::install_github("mrc-ide/cali")
